original_title: Porcos Não Olham para o Céu
overview: What are you obsessed about? Catarina is for everything: cleaning, organising and even for curiosities. Tired of everything, she decides to end her own life. Hoping for your agony of something unexpected your curiosity and that she is reminder of the decision and need to act fast if you want to go back.
title: Pigs Can't Look Up Into the Sky
